You tip your head back and dangle him above your snout.

"Maybe this will refresh your memory."

With that, you open your mouth wide and drop the smaller 'roo. It would be tantalizingly easy to swallow him whole right now and be done with it, but you stop yourself. You have bigger plans.

You let roll him around with your tongue before letting him slide toward your gullet. You can feel him scrambling against your tongue, trying to get a grip, but it's too slippery for him to escape. Instead, you reach into your mouth and grab him moments before he could slip away forever. You lift him out and regard him with a grin. He's dripping with your drool, coughing and sputtering. Once he can breathe again, he panics, crying out desperately.

"I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!"

You chuckle menacingly, and say to him in a low voice,

"Sorry? I don't believe you."

He's stricken with terror, at that.

"I am! I'll prove it to you! I'll do anything you want!"

Anything, he says? Now there's an interesting offer.

111111.content:
You giggle as a delightful idea comes to you.

"Well... I am very hungry."

You let a little drool dribble down your chin, and he shudders, suddenly feeling quite sure he's going to be eaten.

"I could just eat you. I mean, you're delicious." You lick your lips, wiping away the drool from before.

"But I'm feeling nice, especially after such a nice apology. So here's the deal."

You set him down, and he looks up at you, hardly daring to believe it.

"If you can bring me something tasty, I'll forgive you. Easy as that! What do you say?"

The male nods slowly, before starting to move away hesitantly, not sure if this is a trick. He stiffens when you start to speak once more.

"Oh, and I'm sure I don't have to tell you... Don't even think about running away. If you do, I will find you, and make you wish I had simply eaten you and gotten it over with."

He doesn't speak, but you can tell he understands. He turns and hops away as fast as his leg will carry him.

Looks like you've got some time to kill. You look over at the lake, with its cool, clear water. It's a hot day, perfect for a dip.

You step into the lake, causing great waves of water to be thrown up onto the shore. It's crisp and refreshing, and you spend quite some time swimming and splashing about. Once you finally climb out, the water level dips noticeably. You relax on the shore, letting the sun dry your fur. Eventually though, your stomach rumbles. Your thoughts drift back to the male roo. What has become of him?

With a deft motion, you flick the male to the ground. He skids along it, but before he comes to a stop of his own accord, you catch him under your massive foot, He's left panting, dirt mixing with spit to create mud that coats his face and chest.

You lean down and rest and elbow on your knee, slowly rocking more of your enormous weight onto him.

"Now," you say, your voice full of mock patience. "Tell me what it was you said."

When he still doesn't answer, you start to slowly push down.

Panicking, the male finally starts to talk, hos words coming out in choked gasps.

"I... I called you.. I said you... looked... like..." At this point, you applied still more pressure in order to speed him up. "Like you had eaten a country..."

He closed his eyes, prepared for you to drop your full weight and squash him flat. But you weren't going to let him off quite so easily.

"Mm. That wasn't very nice, was it?"

He opened his eyes, lifting his head enough to see the bottom of your foot.

"N... no... it wasn't."

"But you know better now, right? You won't do it again?"

"Right... know... better.:

"Good. Now say you're sorry."

"I'm... sorry..."

Deciding he's had enough, you lift your foot off of him, and stand up straight again. The smaller kangaroo gasps, but stays laying where he is. His fur is messy and coated in dirt. He's not likely to insult you again any time soon, but perhaps some additional repayment is in order.

Through the pain, you become suddenly aware of the creature that you rest on- her leg is warm, and her wiry fur rubs at your back as your blood spills down onto her, making her fur sticky and wet. She opens her mouth, and even with it high above you, you can see blood coating her snout and formless meat that used to be part of you vanishing into the back of her mouth.

You will your body to faint, or die, or anything to free you from your reality, but it is in vain. The giant kangaroo leans down over you, poking her tongue into your body where it is split open. You can feel her searching around inside of you, and then pulling her tongue out and swallowing. She laps at you in the fashion a while longer before slipping her tongue under you and pulling all that's left into her mouth.

You are far too weak to fight back. Hot saliva engulfs you, flowing into your mouth and eyes and nose and wounds. You hear a dull crunching and realize faintly that she must be chewing on you. Everything goes red, and you think you feel your spine crack. There's a strange pressure as the red fades to black, and you feel as if your skin is dissolving as the last vestiges of your consciousness do the same.
